laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Doppler examination of the transplanted kidney
laboratory_examinations.findings: Resistive indices within the upper, mid and lower poles are 0.78, 0.83 and 0.79 respectively, elevated and increased compared to the prior exam.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Elevated and increased compared to the prior exam.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Transplanted kidney measures 11.7 cm with stable mild hydronephrosis; small amount of perinephric fluid; ascites in all four quadrants; thickening of the bladder wall is unchanged.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Stable mild hydronephrosis; thickening of bladder wall unchanged.
